GUIFrameAuszahlung - Class in main
This class is used to read the value of the amount to be withdrawn into the account Just in one Case : the Amount to be withdrawn is greater or not equal to the Amount in the account

GUIFrameFehler - Class in main
This class is used to Display an error message, that the current Transaction cannot succeed, and the reason is that the Amount to be withdrawn is greater or not equal to the Amount in the account
